name: Driver Taxi Simulator
description:
Hurry up there are passengers waiting who wants to travel to their desired location pick them up and drop them off. Be the best taxi driver in the city. Enjoy and have fun while driving the taxi. Don't collide with the traffic as the customer will get angry and will give you a bad rating.

Driver Taxi Simulator comes with a new city and cool user interface. It has great controls and it is very easy to maneuver.
